ðŸ“– Summary: MBASE is a C++ inference SDK designed to facilitate the integration of LLMs into various applications. It offers non-blocking APIs for both text generation and embedding, supports multiple models via llama.cpp, and includes tools for performance benchmarking, enabling developers to embed LLM capabilities into performance-critical applications.
